kerzen.title: Candles
kerzen.description: For candles, we use only high-quality wax, not paraffin. Each candle can be tailored to various occasions, from molded candles to animal-shaped, angelic, Halloween-themed, and other designs.

karten.title: Greeting Cards
karten.description: Our greeting cards are handmade, each card is unique and crafted with love. You can order cards for any occasion, including weddings, birthdays, Christmas, Easter, and more.

gips.title: Gypsum Figures
gips.description: Our gypsum figures are wonderful decorative pieces for your home. Handcrafted, they make perfect gifts or decoration for any event.

3d.title: 3D Printing
3d.description: We specialize in 3D-printed souvenirs and decorative products. You can order custom models or choose from our catalog of ready-made 3D products.
